features: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner is a keratin deep conditioner treatment formulated to smooth frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours.*system vs. non-conditioning shampoo
Ultimate keratin system hair conditioner treatment designed with Lamellar-Discipline transforms frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours.**system vs. non-conditioning shampoo
For a professional quality cleansing conditioner experience, TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner provides an at-home keratin hair treatment to revive dry hair and provide a sleek finish
TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner is a dry hair conditioner designed to give you lasting smoothness and perfectly manageable hair from the first wash
Infused with marula oil, this conditioner for hair seals down the cuticle preventing humidity from penetrating the hair for ultimate frizz control and smoother, shinier hair
For best results with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner, pair with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo
body.description: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo is a salon shampoo designed with Lamellar-Discipline technology formulated to transform your frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look for up to 72 hours* system vs. non-conditioning shampoo. Formulated with keratin for smooth, shiny manageable hair, this keratin hair treatment is infused with marula oil to seal down the cuticle prevent humidity from penetrating the hair for ultimate frizz control. To use, apply a generous amount of the shampoo to wet hair. Massage gently from roots to end to work into a lather. Rinse thoroughly. Follow with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner. From our origins in salons, we have always been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salon, without spending a fortune. TRESemmé is dedicated to creating hair care and styling products that are salon quality without the salon price. Great for all hair types, just shampoo in the shower and your hair will feel nourished and ready so that you can take on the day and night with confidence. The TRESemmé mission is to create a disruptive path forward so women can lead the way in life and style. Learn more at tresemme.com/purpose.

productInformation.value: Damage Control, Hydrating, Split End Treatment, Frizz Control, Conditioning

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Conditioner with Lamellar-Discipline technology, reduces frizz, detangles knots, boosts shine and repairs damage for smooth, strong hair. Our conditioner is specially formulated to give you noticeably smooth, manageable hair minus the frizz for up to 72 hours.

Our Portfolio Born in salons over 70 years ago, TRESemme is dedicated to helping you own your unique style and step out into the world with confidence. For Salon-Quality Results At TRESemme we are proud of our professional heritage and, to this day, formulate our products with a rigorous salon-quality approach to ingredients and testing. Not Tested on Animals Our TRESemme policy prohibits animal testing for our products and the ingredients used in them, anywhere in the world. Proud Partners of New York Fashion Week When designers show at New York Fashion Week, TRESemme is backstage bringing the latest hair trends and looks to life as the official sponsor of NYFW for over 10 years.

TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo, 20 oz TRESemmé Thermal Creations Keratin Smooth Leave-In Heat Protectant Spray, 8 oz TRESemmé Expert Selection Keratin Smooth Shine Serum, 3.3 oz Main Benefit Formulated with Keratin for smooth, shiny manageable hair, this shampoo is infused with Lamellar-Discipline Technology to transform your frizzy, unruly hair into a smooth, sleek look. This leave-in spray helps shield hair from heat up to 450°F so you can achieve a smooth look while protecting your hair from heat styling. This anti-frizz serum helps to transform hair and create the glossy look of a professional blow-dry style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for dry damaged hair
reviews.reviewText: After one use I could feel a difference in my dry damage and breaking hair. I tried to use the bar shampoo and conditioner to be more eco-friendly, but it was damaging my long color-treated hair. After the second use I could even see a difference. Hopefully after a couple weeks my hair will be much healthier and not have so much breakage.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Calm the Frizz
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner was almost a miracle for taming the frizziness out of my hair. No more being frightened to run a brush through. The softness is real.
